BlackNightmare::

Blacknightmare followed Orchestra; when she was close to =
him, she moved her hands towards his shoulders and put then there and with =
her sweetest tone said "My love, all those ideas are for your protection...=
 When Alliance capture a bot they do two things: kill the intruder or repro=
grame him. But I can't help you if you don't trust me and In the things tha=
t I have to do... Do you trust me?"

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From=

  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, May 30, 200=
1 7:33 PM
  Subject: Re: Musical Bots


  ::Orchestra::

       Orchestra l=
et go of Blacknightmare, and started pacing across the room
  with his poin=
ter finger and thumb sort of pinching his chin.

        "I see......So, wh=
at ideas do you have in mind?  Every little bit
  counts, so don't hold bac=
k any piece of your ideas......" Orchestra said.
